item.description:
Come one Come all...we are heading to the Fair.

The Topsfield fair has been an annual event for 191 years.

Like the Midway? Like the Vendors? The Animals? The Largest Pumpkin? Agricultural exhibits? Whatever your interest, Topsfield fair has it. Come join us for a day at the fair and enjoy a great fall event.

Costs: Parking $8.00, Adult General Admission $12.00

More information is located on the Fair website: http://www.topsfieldf....

Rain will cancel this event, so please be sure to check the site prior to departing for the event.

As a reminder, we will only wait 15 mins at the meeting place, so if you are going to be late please notify one of the organizers.

9/7/09 UPDATE: Munib has been gracious enough to offer his property as a meeting place so that we can carpool and save some parking fees. When we get closer to the date of this event, I will send Munib's address to those who RSVP Yes.

Also, discounted tickets for entrance to the fair are available from AAA. If you buy your ticket at a AAA office the price is only $8.00. If you are not a AAA member and would like a discounted ticket, please contact one of the organizers.[/color]
item.how_to_find_us: Meet at the admissions gate located in Lot A
item.name: Topsfield Fair
